name: Google Business Profile
natural_language_description: 这是 Google Business Profile 节点。主要用于: Consume Google Business Profile API

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: post
available_options: Post (值: post)
Review (值: review)
Custom API Call (值: __CUSTOM_API_CALL__)

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: get
available_options: Delete Reply (值: delete) - Delete a reply to a review
Get (值: get) - Retrieve details of a specific review on Google Business Profile
Get Many (值: getAll) - Retrieve multiple reviews
Reply (值: reply) - Reply to a review
Custom API Call (值: __CUSTOM_API_CALL__)

account.name: account
account.natural_language_description: 参数名: Account | 作用: The Google Business Profile account | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

location.name: location
location.description: The specific location or business associated with the account
location.natural_language_description: 参数名: Location | 作用: The specific location or business associated with the account | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

postType.name: postType
postType.description: The type of post to create (standard, event, offer, or alert)
postType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Post Type | 作用: The type of post to create (standard, event, offer, or alert) | 默认值: STANDARD | (必填项)
available_options: Standard (值: STANDARD)
Event (值: EVENT)
Offer (值: OFFER)
Alert (值: ALERT)

summary.name: summary
summary.description: The main text of the post
summary.natural_language_description: 参数名: Summary | 作用: The main text of the post | (必填项)

title.name: title
title.description: E.g. 20% off in store or online.
title.natural_language_description: 参数名: Title | 作用: E.g. 20% off in store or online. | (必填项)

startDateTime.name: startDateTime
startDateTime.description: The start date and time of the event
startDateTime.natural_language_description: 参数名: Start Date and Time | 作用: The start date and time of the event | (必填项)

endDateTime.name: endDateTime
endDateTime.description: The end date and time of the event
endDateTime.natural_language_description: 参数名: End Date and Time | 作用: The end date and time of the event | (必填项)

startDate.name: startDate
startDate.description: The start date of the offer
startDate.natural_language_description: 参数名: Start Date | 作用: The start date of the offer | (必填项)

endDate.name: endDate
endDate.description: The end date of the offer
endDate.natural_language_description: 参数名: End Date | 作用: The end date of the offer | (必填项)

alertType.name: alertType
alertType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Alert Type | 作用: The sub-type of the alert | 默认值: COVID_19 | (必填项)
available_options: Covid 19 (值: COVID_19) - This alert is related to the 2019 Coronavirus Disease pandemic

additionalOptions.name: additionalOptions
additionalOptions.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: summary (值: None) - The main text of the post
languageCode (值: None) - The language code of the post content. More info.
callToActionType (值: None) - The type of call to action
url (值: None) - The URL that users are sent to when clicking through the promotion
startDateTime (值: None) - The start date and time of the event
endDateTime (值: None) - The end date and time of the event
title (值: None) - E.g. 20% off in store or online.
startDate (值: None) - The start date of the offer
endDate (值: None) - The end date of the offer
couponCode (值: None) - The coupon code for the offer
redeemOnlineUrl (值: None) - Link to redeem the offer
termsConditions (值: None) - The terms and conditions of the offer

post.name: post
post.description: Select the post to retrieve its details
post.natural_language_description: 参数名: Post | 作用: Select the post to retrieve its details | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''}

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 20 | (必填项)

notice.displayName: Make sure that the updated options are supported by the post type. More info.
notice.name: notice
notice.natural_language_description: 参数名: Make sure that the updated options are supported by the post type. More info.

review.name: review
review.description: Select the review to retrieve its details
review.natural_language_description: 参数名: Review | 作用: Select the review to retrieve its details | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

reply.name: reply
reply.description: The body of the reply (up to 4096 characters)
reply.natural_language_description: 参数名: Reply | 作用: The body of the reply (up to 4096 characters)

requestOptions.name: requestOptions
requestOptions.natural_language_description: 参数名: Request Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: batching (值: None)
allowUnauthorizedCerts (值: None) - Whether to accept the response even if SSL certificate validation is not possible
proxy (值: None) - HTTP proxy to use. If authentication is required it can be defined as follow: http://username:password@myproxy:3128
timeout (值: None) - Time in ms to wait for the server to send response headers (and start the response body) before aborting the request
